rotein. Other people with incontinentia pigmenti have mutations that prevent the production of any IKBKG protein. Without this protein, nuclear factor-kappa-B is not regulated properly, and cells are more sensitive to signals that trigger them to self-destruct. Researchers believe that this abnormal cell death leads to the signs and symptoms of incontinentia pigmenti.",GHR,incontinentia pigmenti
Is incontinentia pigmenti inherited ?,"This condition is inherited in an X-linked dominant pattern. T
